text.tspan: // merge one branch into a subdirectory
If applicable, many of the above commands
can be triggered without the --db (-d) and
Use selectors instead of revision IDs:
a:joe Revisions w/ matching author cert
b:foo.ba Revisions w/ matching branch cert
h:foo.ba Revisions w/ matching branch heads
t:r-1.0 Revisions w/ matching tag cert
d:2006-2 Revisions w/ matching date cert
e:2005 Revisions w/ date cert value earlier
l:2005 Revisions w/ date cert value later
// update to the head revision of a branch
// show all revisions user Joe signed today
